name: Dark Forretress
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It stays motionless in trees, driving away with flying armored shards from its hard shell any who come close.

attacks.name: Armor Up
attacks.effect: Until the end of your next turn, if Dark Forretress would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, Dark Forretress is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP become 10 instead.

attacks.name: Explosion
attacks.effect: Dark Forretress does 60 damage to itself.
